thread.title: Myriad Supply Renews Platinum Level Status in Palo Alto Networks NextWave Partner Program
thread.title_full: Myriad Supply Renews Platinum Level Status in Palo Alto Networks NextWave Partner Program

title: Myriad Supply Renews Platinum Level Status in Palo Alto Networks NextWave Partner Program
text: Myriad Supply Renews Platinum Level Status in Palo Alto Networks NextWave Partner Program Achievement underscores proven expertise in enterprise security. NEW YORK, NY, September 21,   Myriad Supply, a New York City based IT solutions provider, announced today that it has renewed their platinum level status in the Palo Alto Networks NextWave Partner Program. By maintaining platinum status since 2014, Myriad Supply shows their commitment to facilitating significant sales momentum and demonstrating extensive expertise in enterprise security. With its next-generation security platform, Palo Alto Networks is leading a new era in cybersecurity by safely enabling applications and preventing successful cyberattacks for thousands of organizations around the world. The Palo Alto Networks NextWave Partner Program is an exclusive and valued program for resellers. Being a Platinum level member of this program underscores that Myriad is dedicated to providing clients with innovative and unmatched security solutions backed by diligent training on Palo Alto Networks next-generation firewall capabilities. "Achieving platinum-level status with Palo Alto Networks is just one more step in our commitment to providing best-of-breed security solutions to our clients. Our engineers stand ready to protect our clients' networks with the best defenses in this uncertain security landscape," said Andrew Fisher, Founder and CEO, Myriad Supply. In order to reach the platinum level, Myriad Supply's sales team and engineers were required to become accredited configuration experts, trained in designing, deploying, maintaining and troubleshooting the vast majority of Palo Alto Networks-based security implementations. They have extensive experience with next-generation hardware firewalls and can support a wide variety of solutions. Myriad Supply's focus on quality and value is exemplified by their achievement of platinum status in the NextWave Partner Program. It solidifies that they are capable and committed to educating their clients on a complete security solution that suits the evolving demands of today's security landscape.About Myriad Supply Myriad Supply, founded in 2003, is a widely recognized solution provider, delivering best-of-breed hardware in networking, data storage, wireless, VoIP, security, and cloud solutions. Myriad serves over 10,000 customers and has a _99% customer retention rate. For more information call Myriad Supply at (866) 725-1025, or write info@myriadsupply.com. # # #
